title: Save on a One-Day Admission to TheFitExpo from Chino Valley Ranchers
author: Chino Valley Ranchers
content:
Chino Valley Ranchers is offering friends and family an opportunity to join TheFitExpo in Los Angeles, California at a discounted rate on January 6 and January 7. Simply present the attached coupon to the ticket counter and receive $10 off the original $30 admission cost. So share it with friends and family to score a great deal!

This will be the second year that Chino Valley Ranchers holds a spot at TheFitExpo in Los Angeles. Chino Valley Ranchers has farms throughout southern California and we offer a wide variety of our products available at your local grocery store. Come visit us at the TheFitExpo in Los Angeles at booth #1034 to learn more about our products!

Chino Valley Ranchers will be tabling at TheFitExpo on Saturday, January 6 and Sunday, January 7. TheFitExpo has been a commonplace for fitness and nutrition enthusiasts to join in a giant exhibition floor. Visitors can explore vendors, check out free seminars and learn about health and well-being products. TheFitExpo is a family-friendly event open to visitors of all ages.
